ClericCantrips.Name: Guidance
ClericCantrips.Description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

ClericCantrips.Name: Resistance
ClericCantrips.Description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice.

ClericCantrips.Name: Sacred Flame
ClericCantrips.Description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage.

ClericCantrips.Name: Spare the Dying
ClericCantrips.Description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable.

ClericCantrips.Name: Thaumaturgy
ClericCantrips.Description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range.

ClericCantrips.Name: Light
ClericCantrips.Components: V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)
ClericCantrips.Description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

ClericCantrips.Name: Mending
ClericCantrips.Description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin.
